title: Wings of Rhapsody
description: Wings of Rhapsody, an anthology of poems by Seema K Jayaraman is an eclectic mix of poetry in different forms and is divided into two parts - part one a collection of poems in free-verse format and part two with highly intricate Haiku and Tanka styles. The books is being showcased in the U.K Based Leavener's Poets' Corner.
author: Seema K. Jayaraman
